list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add user entity with roles, repository, service, and controller
- Defined user entity with username, password, first name, last name, and email fields - Enforced unique constraints for username and email - Added BCrypt password encoding in the entity - Implemented user roles (ADMIN, USER) with enum - Created user repository, service, and controller layers - Added frontend user registration and login forms with input validation

task.summary:
Add security config, PrePersist for task creation time, React frontend setup, and MySQL migration
- Added simple security configuration for API endpoints. - Implemented @PrePersist to automatically set 'createdAt' time on Task entities. - Set up the frontend framework using React for UI development. - Migrated from H2 database to MySQL, updated application properties for MySQL connection.

Fetch Data from Backend, Add Task Priorities, and Improve UI Design
- Set up Axios in React to fetch task data from backend - Added task priorities with enum (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH) and display them in different colors (red, orange, green) - Updated React components to handle priority input when creating tasks - Improved UI/UX: - Alternating background colors for tasks (white/grey) - Added margin and alignment improvements for task properties - Added delete button to each task and positioned it properly - Refined form and task list design with flexbox layout and shadows - Enhanced overall UI for better user experience
Add optional deadlines and handling of overdue tasks

Add user entity with roles, repository, service, and controller
- Defined user entity with username, password, first name, last name, and email fields - Enforced unique constraints for username and email - Added BCrypt password encoding in the entity - Implemented user roles (ADMIN, USER) with enum - Created user repository, service, and controller layers - Added frontend user registration and login forms with input validation

MESSAGE.value:
Add security config, PrePersist for task creation time, React frontend setup, and MySQL migration
- Added simple security configuration for API endpoints. - Implemented @PrePersist to automatically set 'createdAt' time on Task entities. - Set up the frontend framework using React for UI development. - Migrated from H2 database to MySQL, updated application properties for MySQL connection.

Fetch Data from Backend, Add Task Priorities, and Improve UI Design
- Set up Axios in React to fetch task data from backend - Added task priorities with enum (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH) and display them in different colors (red, orange, green) - Updated React components to handle priority input when creating tasks - Improved UI/UX: - Alternating background colors for tasks (white/grey) - Added margin and alignment improvements for task properties - Added delete button to each task and positioned it properly - Refined form and task list design with flexbox layout and shadows - Enhanced overall UI for better user experience
Add optional deadlines and handling of overdue tasks

Add user entity with roles, repository, service, and controller
- Defined user entity with username, password, first name, last name, and email fields - Enforced unique constraints for username and email - Added BCrypt password encoding in the entity - Implemented user roles (ADMIN, USER) with enum - Created user repository, service, and controller layers - Added frontend user registration and login forms with input validation
